detail_desc: Knitted hat and mittens in soft cotton. Hat with a faux fur pompom and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed foldover cuffs. Sizes 0-6 months without thumbs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill at the top and ties at the sides.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Short dress in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
A-line skirt in stretch denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless top in airy, tiered chiffon with a raw-edge neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in ribbed velour with a high, elasticated waist and flared legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. These pared-back joggers are made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. They have covered elastication at the waist and hems, jersey-lined pockets in the side seams and an open back pocket.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.
Leggings in soft, printed jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Slightly boxy jumper knitted in a soft, fluffy wool blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Boxy-style top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif of two parakeets with wings that continue up over the shoulder straps and turn into three layers of colourful flounces that meet at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit pima cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket denim jeans in cotton containing some linen. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a smocked bodice. Square neckline and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking at the cuffs.
Waterproof ankle boots in imitation leather with a glittery appliqué on the outside, zip on the inside and loops at the top. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 2.5 cm.

Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, ties and buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long puff sleeves with slits and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with pleats around the neckline, and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap across the top. Unlined.
Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cap with a woven front and mesh back. Appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longer shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cotton-blend top in a sturdy, ribbed purl knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere and wool blend.

Ankle-length kaftan in a sturdy, jacquard-weave viscose blend with a pattern in shimmering metallic thread. Round neckline with a covered button and small opening at the top, a pleat at the back for added width, discreet pockets in the side seams and short, wide sleeves.
Suede hobo bag with a magnetic fastener and leather handle. Two side pockets, decorative seams on the outside and three inner compartments, one with  zip. Size 25x15x30 cm.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Tight fit.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and slightly shorter, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Cropped, soft jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back and narrow shoulder straps.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Smartphone case in printed plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with an elasticated edge. Zip down the front, elasticated cuffs and elastication at the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a lace-covered back in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and buttons at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.

Strapless, push-up balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fitted, ribbed vest top with a trim around the neckline and racer back. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Lace bra with non-wired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
Treggings in soft, patterned corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short, empire-line dress in seersucker with a square neckline front and back and short, voluminous puff sleeves with elastication and a frill over the shoulders and at the hems. Gathered tier on the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Calf-length, patterned skirt in satin with a concealed zip at the back, slits in the sides and an asymmetric hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with an embroidered motif on the brim. Width of brim 12 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a pocket in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose and cotton blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.
Hair set with six metal hair clips and 20 small hair elastics without metal clips. Length of hair clips 4 cm.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and soft brushed inside. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.

Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and a jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring and ribbed trim. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary, long-sleeved T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings. One pair decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter 3 cm.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
